member.name: T:iPAHeartBeat.Core.Dependency.DependencyResolver
member.summary: This class will helper system to provide instance of the type to reuse, it's a kind of singleton system. but It might provides the options do variance implementation of the type by changing a single location.

member.summary: Local collection of the the Types which are are registered without its instance.

member.summary: local Collection of the instance object of the type to reuse.
